sentence.Network_en: Emperor Nero attended the bacchanalian orgy.
sentence.Network_cn: 尼禄皇(罗马暴君)参加了狂饮的祭酒神仪式.

sentence.Network_en: And Mardi Gras , today, is a boisterous, bacchanalian splurge of music and mayhem.
sentence.Network_cn: 但今天的谢肉节却成为欢腾喧闹 、 狂欢畅饮而又音乐和暴行杂陈的节日.
